meanings.definition: Divided into or consisting of multiple parts or elements.
meanings.sent1: The toy car was multipartite, with detachable wheels and doors.
meanings.sent2: The puzzle was multipartite, made up of many small pieces that fit together.
meanings.sent3: The cake looked like a multipartite masterpiece, with layers of different flavors.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a multipartite jigsaw puzzle, each thought a piece waiting to be connected.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a multipartite wonderland, with flowers of every color and shape.

meanings.definition: Involving or relating to multiple parties or groups.
meanings.sent1: The multipartite agreement required signatures from all stakeholders.
meanings.sent2: The multipartite event brought together people from different backgrounds.
meanings.sent3: The family reunion was a multipartite affair, with relatives flying in from all over.
meanings.sent4: The city council meeting was a multipartite gathering, with representatives from various districts.
meanings.sent5: The school project was a multipartite collaboration, with students working in teams.
